fn.p: The following information was supplied relating to ethical approvals (i.e., approving body and any reference numbers):
Ethics clearance and permits for this research were obtained from Cabildo Insular de La Palma with the sampling permit 201302/030-A/OT-098/2013 and Tenerife, 13796/JBFT/CPA/AFF 97/13, 2013-00484.
